details.advanced_info:
Surge Health and damage scaling
Linear scaling per gold spent
Multiplier per gold spent 0.23999
For example, a level 1 Ancient of War has 850 health when played for 1 gold, 1054 (+204) health when played for 2 gold, and 1258 (+204 more again) health when played for 3 gold

description.en: Sequential taps increase Radius by 1.
Gain a level after casting Rank 3.
Spell sequence starts at rank 3 and ends at rank 4.

details.advanced_info:
Like most spells, Arcane Blast deals half damage against player Barracks.
Interaction with buffs
Each cast of Arcane Blast is considered a separate spell, so buffs like Moonkin's +2 levels to the next spell only affect the first cast.
On the other hand, each cast is also considered a separate spell for positive effects, like buffing Bloodmage Thalnos.
Torrent talent
Additional levels are capped at +10

description.en: Periodically pull Ranged enemies into melee range, stunning them for 2 seconds (8 second cooldown). Death Grip has a minimum range of 3 and a maximum range of 8.
Soulshatter also applies to Poisoned enemies.

On death, become invulnerable for 3 seconds. If the target dies, return to life with 25% health. The target that needs to die, is the first enemy that Arthas attacks after resurrecting and becoming invulnerable.

details.advanced_info:
Without a Wildcard slot, Arthas cannot buff a Swole Troll that does not have Meatier Elbow.
Remorseless Winter:
Applies Frost to nearby enemies
Frost reduces both their attack and movement speed by 50%
6.5 radius from Arthas
Note that this range means that most ranged minis will be shooting at Arthas from outside the Frost aura, if Arthas is fighting against a tank
Army of the Dead:
Periodically summons a Frosty Footman
Maximum of 2 Footmen at a time, per Arthas
Both are summoned immediately when you deploy Arthas
13-second cooldown for each Footman, starts when summoned, so if they die after 13 seconds or more, Arthas immediately summons another
Soulshatter:
While deployed, Frosted enemies die instantly when taking any damage below 20% health
Does not apply to buildings, bosses, and mini-bosses
Global while Arthas is alive
Target needs to be hit while already under 20% health â€“ mostly effective against big tanks because small minis often die to a hit while under 20% health anyway
Lichborne:
Nearby allied Alliance Minis summon stationary Skeleton Mages on death
Allied, so also works for your partners' minis in co-op, but only close to Arthas
12 radius from Arthas

description.en: Fully Heal the possessed target.
Possessed targets detonate on death, damaging nearby enemies.
Possessed targets gain Bloodlust for 10 seconds.

details.advanced_info:
Possession:
The possessed unit always acquires the Banshee's level, which can be higher or lower than the original
Banshee ignores other Banshees and does not try to possess them
Life Drain:
If Banshee cannot possess a target (boss or Barracks), it applies a damage-over-time effect instead.
Deals 10 Elemental damage every 0.1 seconds for 10 seconds, for a total of 1000 damage.

details.advanced_info:
Without a Wildcard slot, Charlga cannot buff
Treant
Mini costs
Charlga has two decks: a mini pile and a cost pile
At the start of the game, both piles are shuffled independently
Every mini in your hand costs the same, and you can see the next cost together with the next mini
When you play a mini, the mini goes to the bottom of the mini pile, and the miniâ€™s original cost - not the cost you play it for - goes to the bottom of the cost pile
Surge minis add a cost that uses all of your gold to the cost pile
Root attack
Roots ground minis, but not flying minis
Disables Towers for the duration of the channel
4 ticks per second, 6 seconds channel
Deals 2% of target's health + 6 damage per tick (but see the note about percentage damage scaling)
The 6 damage scales with levels as usual
Percentage damage scaling
Minis: 2%, Â±0.2% per level
Buildings: 2%, Â±0.2% per level
Barracks: 0.5%, Â±0.05% per level
Bosses: 1%, Â±0.1% per level
Raid bosses: 0.25%, Â±0.025% per level
No minimum values, so a -10 Charlga loses all percentage damage

description.en: On death, Heal nearby allied minis immediately and over time.
Summon two extra Treants at your base for every 3 Gold spent on deploy.
On death, Root the target for 3 seconds.

details.advanced_info:
Each additional gold you spend on Treants increases their health and damage by +10%
1 gold spawns 1 Treant with the baseline stats
2 gold spawns 2 Treants that both have +10% health and damage
3 gold spawns 3 Treants that each have +20% health and damage
And so on
Each Treant spawned changes the form of Cenarion spells
1 Treant (1 gold) changes Sunfire to Moonfire
2 Treants (2 gold) keep Sunfire as Sunfire
Therefore, odd amounts of gold spent change the form of Cenarion spells whereas even amounts of gold spent keeps them the same
